home.title: Mauricio Guerrero A.
home.subtitle: Systems Engineer - Web Developer focused on creating modern and engaging digital experiences.

experience.title: Systems Engineer
experience.description: Passionate about software development, technological innovation, and process optimization. I specialize in creating efficient and scalable solutions, combining skills in programming, data analysis, and project management. I’m deeply interested in continuous learning and applying new technologies to solve complex problems and make a positive impact on organizations and society.

experience.title: Fullstack Developer Graduate
experience.description: I am a Fullstack Developer trained in the design, development, and implementation of modern web applications. I have solid knowledge in both frontend and backend technologies, and I enjoy building functional and efficient solutions. I’m motivated by continuous learning, facing new challenges, and contributing to projects in development companies.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
experience.description: As a freelance developer, I dedicate my time to creating independent applications to practice my skills and explore new technologies. My projects reflect continuous learning and my ability to develop functional solutions that demonstrate my experience and creativity in software development.

experience.title: Systems Engineer - Backend Developer
experience.description: I have worked in healthcare institutions, managing databases for medical records and developing frontend interfaces to access this information, as well as providing computer and network support.

experience.title: Systems Engineer - Instructor
experience.description: I’ve had the opportunity to train people in fields such as Robotics, Computer Systems, and Equipment Maintenance.
